markdown:
May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands **Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 75 **Price** 13,000 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This staff is made from the femur of a [gold dragon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=173) wrapped in the multicolored scales of every type of [chromatic](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=34) and [metallic dragon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=35). When wielding this staff, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to skill checks to [Coerce](/Actions.aspx?ID=52), [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50), [Request](/Actions.aspx?ID=51), or [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47) to [dragons](/Traits.aspx?ID=50) and creatures with strong draconic ties (such as [kobolds](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=18), [dragon instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=2) [barbarians](/Classes.aspx?ID=2), and [draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=5) [sorcerers](/Classes.aspx?ID=11)).
  • **2nd** [_illusory creature_](/Spells.aspx?ID=158) (dragons only)
  • **4th** [_reflective scales_](/Spells.aspx?ID=583)
  • **5th** [_summon dragon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=319)
  • **6th** [_dragon form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=88), _summon dragon_ (6th)
  • **7th** _summon dragon_ (7th)
name: Wyrm Drinker
